segments.text: What wrong with you ? You look pale ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m not sure . I feel hot and cold .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was sick most of the night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It sounds like you ’ re coming down with the flu . Let me take your temperature .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Thirty-eight point seven . Do you have a headache , chestache or throat pain ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now , Let me have a look at you . I ’ d like to listen to your chest . Breathe then , deep breath , that ’ s it . Cough , now again . I want to exam your throat too . Open wide , say A .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , It does look a bit sore.Let ’ s take your extra way of your chest and give you a few tests .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The tests showed nothing wrong . a slight by infection .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m giving you some antibiotic and aspirin . Taking aspirin when you ’ Ve got a fever and take one antibiotic until four hours and go home lie in bed for two days . Take some water then you feel better .
